page.title: 15CUMBRIA NEWSPAPER PRINT
page.content: {C.N.PRINT}are commercial printers. They print brochures and postcards. 64 people work in C.N.PRINT There is have a daughter company in Preston, another 14 people work there. C.N.Print opened in 1974. The hours are 8.o,clock.am to 4.30.pm,Monday to Thursday and on Friday 8.am to 1.30.pm The workforce is 60% men and 40% women. The average wage in C.N.Print is Â£180 to a Â£170 per week. The raw materials come from Cumbria Scandanavia Germany France and Sweden. Mr Inskip,the managing director said that any company coming to Cumbria would be very pleased with the workforce as the people of Cumbria were excellent workers.
